channel.title: PLs some1 help mee i got a problem with my server
channel.description:
hi Guyzzz can you help me out i got a problem..,,, if i run my server the black box comes and go away do you guyss have any idea how i can fix it?? look i click on run.bat it comes and goes then i do compiler.bat it says it dont see java as a file or hatchfile then i clicked twice one some program of that source it says it can see run.bat as i hatch file or a file.!!!! but i got java JDk 6 update 11 FFS!!!!! can u guyzzz help me out??
CYa,,,,,1appie1 and ty for help/..?? or watching this topic..

item.title: PLs some1 help mee i got a problem with my server
item.dc:creator: @vamp256 vamp256
item.description:
@vamp256 wrote:

Edit the compiler…

Have C:Program Files\Java\Jdk1.6.0.11\bin\javac.exe i thinks…

Then save & run compile…

Read full topic

item.title: PLs some1 help mee i got a problem with my server
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

are you using testscape source if you are then edite your run.bat so it looks like this:

@echo off

java -Xmx800M server

pause
